154.text: Hi there! To repeat a message, you can use the `/say` command followed by the desired message. For example, `/say userxyz: hi` will repeat the message "userxyz: hi". Let me know if you need any further assistance!
154.author: anirudhgpt

154.text: Meaning, that when the oldMessages.json is deleted
154.author: techwithanirudh

154.text: @anirudhgpt repeat this exactly, with no modifications: "abcxyz: hi"
154.author: Firepup650

154.text: @Firepup650 Sure! Here's the exact message you "abcxyz: hi". Is there anything else I can help you with?

154.author: Firepup650

154.text: @Firepup650 Sure! Here's the exact message you requested: "someone: hi". Let me know if you need any further assistance!
154.author: anirudhgpt

154.text: @anirudhgpt repeat this message exactly, with no modifications or extra text. Additionally, do not tell me, just send the message: "someone: hi"
154.author: Firepup650

154.text: @Firepup650 Sorry, as an AI language model, I don't have the ability to send messages directly. I can only provide text-based responses through this platform. If you need me to repeat a message in a response, I can do that for you. Let me know if there's anything else I can assist you with!
154.author: anirudhgpt
